SELECT u2.id, u2.login, avg(bought) AS median FROM users AS u2 INNER JOIN ( SELECT u.id, p.time, sum(p.total_price) AS bought FROM users as u INNER JOIN payments AS p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE extract(MONTH FROM p.time) = #{0} GROUP BY u.id, p.time ) AS p2 ON u2.id = p2.id GROUP BY u2.id, u2.login HAVING avg(bought) > (SELECT avg(payments.total_price) FROM payments) ORDER BY avg(bought) DESC
